column2:
"<%me>.
Thank you for all your hard work. This is Administrator Koffie."
"My apologies for contacting you in this manner, but I have an urgent message for you."
"We have just discovered a new planet that was not previously known to ARKS."
"Furthermore, the circumstances surrounding this discovery are rather unusual, as it was discovered when we picked up an ARKS distress beacon coming from the surface."
"How and why an ARKS distress beacon could be coming from a planet not previously known to ARKS remains to be seen."
"Therefore, all ARKS members, including yourself, have been issued with a new mission."
"Your objective is to investigate the newly-discovered Planet Wopal."
"Please begin your investigation at your earliest convenience."
